data.meanings: day, era, time, today, this/that day, age/period of time.
data.sentence: The word يَوْمِ comes from the root ي و م and is associated with the meanings: day, era, time, today, this/that day, age/period of time.
The word إِلَى comes from the root ا ل ي and is associated with the meanings:

data.meanings: to fix, defined/determined/limited a thing as to time, appoint/declare/assign a time, measure of time (e.g. season).
data.sentence: The word الْوَقْتِ comes from the root و ق ت and is associated with the meanings: to fix, defined/determined/limited a thing as to time, appoint/declare/assign a time, measure of time (e.g. season).

data.meanings: to mark/sign/distinguish, creations/beings, world, science/learning/knowledge/information, aware/know. By means of which one knows a thing, hence it signifies world or creation, because by it the Creator is known. alim (pl. ulama) - one who is learned/wise or knows.
data.sentence: The word الْمَعْلُومِ comes from the root ع ل م and is associated with the meanings: to mark/sign/distinguish, creations/beings, world, science/learning/knowledge/information, aware/know. By means of which one knows a thing, hence it signifies world or creation, because by it the Creator is known. alim (pl. ulama) - one who is learned/wise or knows.
